# LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.main

**Case**

The app’s main bundle.

## Declaration

```swift
case main
```

## Bundle descriptions

- **LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.atURL(_:)**: A bundle located at a specific file URL.
- **LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.forClass(_:)**: The bundle for a specific class.

items.description: A bundle located at a specific file URL.
items.name: LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.atURL(_:)

items.description: The bundle for a specific class.
items.name: LocalizedStringResource.BundleDescription.forClass(_:)
